00301             inline bool Emitter::isFullZone() const
00302             {
00303                         return full;
00304             }
00305 
00306             inline bool Emitter::isSleeping() const
00307             {
00308                         return ((tank == 0)||(flow == 0.0f));
00309             }
00310 
00311             inline void Emitter::emit(Particle& particle) const
00312             {
00313                         zone->generatePosition(particle,full);
00314                         generateVelocity(particle);
00315             }
00316 
00317             void Emitter::generateVelocity(Particle& particle) const
00318             {
00319                         generateVelocity(particle,random(forceMin,forceMax) / particle.getParamCurrentValue(PARAM_MASS));
00320             }
00321 
00322             inline int Emitter::launchParticle(Particle& particle) const
00323             {
00324                         emit(particle);
00325                         return --nbBorn;
00326             }
00327 
00328             inline void Emitter::innerUpdateTransform()
00329             {
00330                         zone->updateTransform(getParent());
00331             }
00332 }
